attributes.action: Change the London 2012 logo to the old candidate city logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The logo unveiled for the 2012 Olympics is not inspirational neither is it well designed. It will end up being another reason for Britain to be mocked and laughed at. The old candidate city logo is much more stylish and recognisable. Please change it back!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
